The 12th International Conference on
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics

[edit]

April 16 - 18, 2009
Clearwater Beach, Florida, USA

The 12th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics (Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 2010) will be held in Clearwater Beach, Florida, USA from Thursday, 16 April 2009 to Saturday, 18 April 2009 at the Hilton Clearwater Beach Resort.

Since its inception in 1985, AISTATS has been an interdisciplinary gathering of researchers at the intersection of artificial intelligence, machine learning, statistics, and related areas.

The Proceedings of Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 2010 are now available.

Snowbird Learning Workshop

The Snowbird Learning Workshop will be immediately preceeding and co-located with AI/Stats. The Learning Workshop will be April 13-16, with a shared oral session on Thursday, April 16.

Program Chairs

    van Dyk David University of California, Irvine, Max Welling University of California, Irvine,

Fundraising Chair

    Charles Sutton University of Edinburgh,

Publicity Chair

    Alexander Ihler University of California, Irvine,

Publications Chair

    Mauricio Alvarez University of Manchester,
